CustomField.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-014837
Defaults date based on the priority that was selected on the case and the case create date. Does not include Saturday or Sunday's.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Priority , "24 Hrs / Next Day") , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 1 + 1, /* Sun:CreatedDate+ 1 wknd day + 1 day */ 5,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 1, /* Fri:CreatedDate+ 2 wknd days + 1 day */ 6,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 2, /* Sat:CreatedDate+ 2 wknd days + 2 days */ DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 1 /* Default (Mon/Tue/Wed):CreatedDate+ 1 day */ ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Priority , "2 Business Days") , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 1 + 2, /* Sun:CreatedDate+ 1 wknd day + 2 days */ 4,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 2, /* Thurs:CreatedDate+ 2 wknd days + 2 days */ 5,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 2, /* Fri:CreatedDate+ 2 wknd days + 2 days */ 6,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 2, /* Sat:CreatedDate+ 2 wknd days + 2 days */ DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 /* Default (Mon/Tue/Wed):CreatedDate+ 2 days */ ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Priority , "4 Business Days") , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 1 + 4, /* Sun:CreatedDate+ 1 wknd day + 4 days */ 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 4, /* Mon:CreatedDate + 4 days */ DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 4 /* Default (Tue/Wed/Thur/Fri/Sat):CreatedDate+ 4 days */ ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Priority , "5 Business Days") , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 1 + 5, /* Sun:CreatedDate+ 1 wknd day + 5 days */ 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5, /* Mon:CreatedDate+ 5 days */ DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 2 + 5 /* Default (Tue/Wed/Thurs/Fri/Sat):CreatedDate+ 2 wknd + 5 days */ ),DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 14))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Target date based on the priority that was selected on the case and the case creation date.
CustomField.label: Requested Completion Date
